name: Industrielle Biotechnologie Bayern Netzwerk GmbH
goal: Promotion of Industrial Biotechnology and sustainable Bioeconomy by specific tasks and services, paricularly the coordination and the management of the Bavarian Industrial Biotechnology Network (IBB), catalysis of technology transfer, PR, dissimination of relevant information and by supporting the dialogue of enterprises with politics.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment
